homepageBecomeInstructor.instructorSubTitle: The best instructors from around the world teach millions of students at Mundocrypto Academy. We provide the tools and skills to teach the things you love.

subSection1.description: Earn money every time a student purchases your course. Earn $MCT while you learn.
subSection1.title: Earn money

subSection2.description: Help people learn new skills, advance their careers and explore their hobbies by sharing your knowledge.

subSection3.description: Take advantage of our active community of instructors to assist you in the process of creating your course.

faq1.description: Yes, through the Learn to Earn system that is exactly what you get. If you pass the exams you get MCT tokens.
faq1.title: Can I get rewards if I pass the exams?

faq2.description: Currently, there is a clear shortage of good professionals in the crypto and programming sector. The cryptocurrency, Blockchain, Programming, Solidity, Javascript, React, DeFi and Crypto Gaming NFT courses have been specifically designed to meet the needs of crypto companies today.
faq2.title: Will my level of employability really improve after taking cryptocurrency and blockchain courses from Mundo Crypto?

faq3.description: No previous knowledge is required. Each course covers a special field of the crypto sector, and we will take care of teaching the introductory foundations to be able to raise the knowledge without complications.
faq3.title: Do I need to have previous knowledge of the crypto sector?

faq4.description: Yes, it is an online course, fully compatible with a full working day. All classes are hosted on our online platform so 100% compatible with your work and personal life.
faq4.title: I work 33-40 hours a week, can I combine my job with the cryptocurrency courses?

faq5.description: Yes, we believe it is ideal to enhance your knowledge, because of the practicality and depth of the knowledge imparted. We go deep into the whole spectrum of each crypto specialty from zero to one hundred.
faq5.title: If I have previous knowledge in the crypto sector, will the training courses be useful for me?

faq6.description: It is a very simple process, you can navigate to the Instructors page and follow the instructions.
faq6.title: How can I include my course in the Mundocrypto platform?

faq7.title: Is the training online or face-to-face?

faq8.description: Yes, you will be able to take your course and exams 100% adapted to your available time, being 100% flexible online training from 15 minutes a day.
faq8.title: Will I have lifetime access to the online course?

modal.title: Thank you for choosing to learn with us
modal.subtitle: Things you need to know before starting the course
modal.l1: Click the Start Now button to begin.
modal.l2: Keep in mind the duration of your course, as it is very important for the following.
modal.l3: You will have certain months to complete the exams in this course in order to earn rewards from them.
modal.conversion: Courses of less than 15 hours of duration -> 1 month / Courses of between 16 and 30 hours -> 2 months / Courses of more than 31 hours -> 4 months
modal.l4: Don't worry, you will still have lifetime access to the course even if the exams are no longer available.
modal.l5: You can check the rest of LearnToEarn's terms and conditions in our Terms and Conditions.
modal.l6: Once you click Start Now, your entitlement time to claim your exam rewards will begin.

instructions.title_1: Requirements needed to do the exam:1
instructions.title_2: Please read the following instructions carefully before starting your exam:
instructions.i1: Click on the Start Exam button to begin.
instructions.i2: A third-party proctoring service will open in a separate tab. Do not close this tab during the duration of the exam.
instructions.i3: For anti-cheating purposes, you will be required to allow some device permissions.
instructions.i4: Your screen will be recorded during the full duration of the exam.
instructions.i5: Your device camera will also be activated during the exam.
instructions.i6: You must abide by all the rules and regulations of the exam, failure to do so will result in disqualification, and therefore your opportunity to earn rewards in $MCT will be lost.
